import sys
#f = map(lambda x:x.strip(),open("test.txt").readlines())
f = map(lambda x:x.strip(),sys.stdin.readlines())
for i in range(int(f[0])):
    a1,a2 = map(lambda x:map(int,x.split(' ')),[f[2*i+1],f[2*i+2]])
    if a1[0]>a2[0]:
        a1,a2 = a2,a1
    area = (a1[2]-a1[0])*(a1[3]-a1[1]) + (a2[2]-a2[0])*(a2[3]-a2[1])
    if (a2[0]<a1[2]):
        x = min(a2[2],a1[2]) - a2[0]
        if a1[1]<a2[1]<a1[3] or a2[1]<a1[1]<a2[3]:
            y = min(a1[3],a2[3]) - max(a1[1],a2[1])
            area -= x*y
    print area
